name: TATA-Plus
0:
”Alexa, ask Tabot Cleaner to start cleaning”
”Alexa, ask Tabot Cleaner to start charging”
”Alexa, ask Tabot Cleaner to stop cleaning”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tabot cleaner
des:
Using Amazon Alexa, the TATA-Plus skill allows you to interact, monitor and control your Robot Vacuum Cleaner by using voice commands.
To get started, you will need to link your TATA-Plus skill with your app account.
Once linked, you can use voice commands to control your Robot Vacuum Cleaner. For instance, you can try the below voice commands:

* Alexa, ask Tabot Cleaner to start cleaning.
* Alexa, ask Tabot Cleaner to stop cleaning.
* Alexa, ask Tabot Cleaner to start charging.
